content: this crochet v-neck collar is perfect for dressing up a plain v-neck top it s very simple to make as it starts off at the bottom of the v with a two-round granny square then the granny stitch pattern extends up the right side followed by the left side you can make this small for the bottom of the shirt up to the shoulders or all the way around towards the back of the neck you ll clip and sew it to the shirt with evenly-spaced stitches there is a step-by-step tutorial video to assist with this pattern enjoy donna wolfe from naztazia
